List.name: ba sing se
List.desc: Early in its history, Ba Sing Se was a small subterranean city carved out of rocks by earthbenders. As the benders excavated further, they came across beautiful luminous crystals and began to mine them.

List.name: fire nation capital
List.location: Capital Island, central mainland Fire Nation
List.desc: The Fire Nation Capital is one of the largest settlements in the world.[2] It has a distinct layout consisting of the Royal Plaza, a forum located directly past the First Lord's Harbor; Harbor City, a large district consiting of industrial areas and the homes of mostly lower-class people; and Royal Caldera City

List.name: Southern Water Tribe capital city
List.desc: Before the Hundred Year War, it was a city with a substantial population, built by skilled waterbenders, and surrounded by a wall. In course of the Hundred Year War, Fire Nation forces repeatedly attacked and raided the old city. After several decades of fighting, the old city was gradually destroyed and abandoned.
